charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1101_0100:
As [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was strolling through the city one day,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted a group of
Team Break grunts surrounding Zinnia.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_0200:
Pshh! Who cares how legendary your Pokémon is!
There’s more of us than there are of you, girlie!
Get ready to eat dirt!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_0300:
Th-think you can scare us off with a puny cry
like that?! Hah! We outnumber you, like, a million
to one! C’mon, crew! Surround ’em!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0401_0500:
Whoa, look at you! Full points for that sweet,
heroic entrance!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0302_0600: You’ll have to fight me first!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0402_0700:
Whoa, look at you! Full points for that sweet,
heroic entrance!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_0800:
Hah! Think you can boss me around, twerp?
Hope you like the taste o’ dirt, ’cause now you’re
gonna eat it, too! Let’s get ’em!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_1100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] didn’t rescue ME with
that heroic entrance... [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] rescued all of you.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_1200: I was ready to beat you crooks to a pulp...
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_1300:
but I’d rather not scar [Name:PlayerNickname ]
with a grisly image like that, so it looks like
you’re off the hook today.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_1400:
You should thank [Name:PlayerNickname ].
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] came just in the nick of time.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0401_1800:
Wait! You weren’t worried about me, were you?
I’m totally fine.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0402_2000:
Wait! You weren’t worried about me, were you?
I’m totally fine. No harm done.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_2100:
Those thugs thought they were gonna steal
Rayquaza, if you can believe that. Hah!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_2200:
I wonder if crooks like them ever felt a sense of
duty in the past. It does seem unlikely...
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_2300:
but if a sense of duty were betrayed somehow...
Well, I could see how that might lead someone
down the wrong path.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_2400: But I guess that’s really none of my business.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_2500:
What about you? Have you ever thought about
what your duty could be?
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0401_2700:
Really? I’m curious! You’ll have to tell me all
about it sometime.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0302_2800: I don’t really think I have a duty.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0402_2900:
That’s totally OK, too. To be honest, I think that’s
how most people feel.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_3000:
As for me...I believed that I had a duty once—a
mission of great importance.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_3100:
I jumped through every hoop imaginable to fulfill
that duty, trying everything I could think of.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_3200:
But in the end, the person who accomplished it
wasn’t even me.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0401_3400:
I had a duty that I thought was mine, but it was
actually another Trainer who fulfilled it in the end.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_3700:
The point is, we can believe our purpose is one
thing with every fiber of our being, but sometimes
we’re wrong. And that’s OK.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_3900:
Right now, I’m just trying to figure out what I
want to do next—or what I SHOULD do next.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_4000:
Seems like coming to Pasio might have been a
step in the right direction.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_4100:
Getting to encounter Rayquaza under totally
different circumstances than before—and actually
getting to partner up with it this time...
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_4200:
It’s giving me a lot to think about, y’know?
I want to take some time to chew over what
my and Rayquaza’s next move should be.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_4300:
It’d probably be good for you to start thinking
about what you ought to do in the future, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_4400: Think it through well and good, OK?
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_4500:
The world’s unpredictable. You never know
what’s gonna happen one day or the next.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_4600:
That’s why we’ve gotta use our imagination!
To figure out how to fulfill our role in the world,
no matter what happens!
